availability.p: Greek text transcribed by Diego Renato dos Santos. Available at https://sites.google.com/site/nestle1904/.

Context annotation is licensed under a [Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International License](http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/). Available at https://github.com/OpenText-org/context-annotation.

notesStmt.note: Corrections are welcome either through GitHub, the project website (www.opentext.org), or a direct email to Christopher D. Land or Ryder A. Wishart.

sourceDesc.p: The text is that of Eberhard Nestle, published as ̔Η Καινη Διαθηκη, Text with Critical Apparatus (London: British and Foreign Bible Society, 1904).

Contextual speaking turns were derived by Christopher D. Land using projection data in the original [OpenText annotation](https://github.com/OpenText-org/GNT_annotation_v1.0) together with the capitalization of the Nestle 1904 edition. Manual error correction was then carried out by Christopher D. Land and Doosuk Kim.

Turn segments were derived by Ryder A. Wishart by modifying the pericope headings of Robinson and Pierpont's Greek New Testament, which is in the public domain. Differences can be identified by comparing this data to the start and end tokens compiled by [James Tauber](https://github.com/jtauber/vocabulary-tools/blob/master/gnt_data/pericopes.txt).

Move segments were derived by Christopher D. Land from syntax markup copyright 2014-2017 by the Global Bible Initiative, made available under under a [CC-BY-SA License] (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/). Available at https://github.com/biblicalhumanities/greek-new-testament/syntax-trees/nestle1904.
